recipe.title: Snap Pea and Cabbage Slaw
ingredients: 8 ounces sugar snap peas, thinly sliced crosswise
1/4 cup chopped fresh mint or basil
instructions: Whisk oil, lemon juice, and honey in a large bowl; season with salt and pepper. Add cabbage, snap peas, parsley, and mint and toss to combine.
DO AHEAD: Vegetables can be cut and dressing can be made 8 hours ahead. Cover and chill separately. Toss vegetables and dressing together just before serving.
